alert.note: Alert for Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:23PM CDT until June 29 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Stewart County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wranglers Campground, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Big Rock, Land Between The Lakes and Indian Mound. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
